accesskeys.description: Ensures every accesskey attribute value is unique
accesskeys.help: accesskey attribute value must be unique

area-alt.description: Ensures <area> elements of image maps have alternate text
area-alt.help: Active <area> elements must have alternate text

aria-allowed-attr.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are allowed for an element's role
aria-allowed-attr.help: Elements must only use allowed ARIA attributes

aria-allowed-role.description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
aria-allowed-role.help: ARIA role must be appropriate for the element

aria-dpub-role-fallback.description: Ensures unsupported DPUB roles are only used on elements with implicit fallback roles
aria-dpub-role-fallback.help: Unsupported DPUB ARIA roles should be used on elements with implicit fallback roles

aria-hidden-body.description: Ensures aria-hidden='true' is not present on the document body.
aria-hidden-body.help: aria-hidden='true' must not be present on the document body

aria-hidden-focus.description: Ensures aria-hidden elements do not contain focusable elements
aria-hidden-focus.help: ARIA hidden element must not contain focusable elements

aria-input-field-name.description: Ensures every ARIA input field has an accessible name
aria-input-field-name.help: ARIA input fields have an accessible name

aria-required-attr.description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
aria-required-attr.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

aria-required-children.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
aria-required-children.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

aria-required-parent.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require parent roles are contained by them
aria-required-parent.help: Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents

aria-roles.description: Ensures all elements with a role attribute use a valid value
aria-roles.help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

aria-toggle-field-name.description: Ensures every ARIA toggle field has an accessible name
aria-toggle-field-name.help: ARIA toggle fields have an accessible name

aria-valid-attr-value.description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values
aria-valid-attr-value.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

aria-valid-attr.description: Ensures attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes
aria-valid-attr.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

audio-caption.help: <audio> elements must have a captions track

autocomplete-valid.description: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field
autocomplete-valid.help: autocomplete attribute must be used correctly

avoid-inline-spacing.description: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets
avoid-inline-spacing.help: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

blink.help: <blink> elements are deprecated and must not be used

bypass.description: Ensures each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content
bypass.help: Page must have means to bypass repeated blocks

checkboxgroup.description: Ensures related <input type="checkbox"> elements have a group and that the group designation is consistent
checkboxgroup.help: Checkbox inputs with the same name attribute value must be part of a group

color-contrast.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds
color-contrast.help: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

css-orientation-lock.description: Ensures content is not locked to any specific display orientation, and the content is operable in all display orientations
css-orientation-lock.help: CSS Media queries are not used to lock display orientation

definition-list.help: <dl> elements must only directly contain properly-ordered <dt> and <dd> groups, <script> or <template> elements

dlitem.description: Ensures <dt> and <dd> elements are contained by a <dl>
dlitem.help: <dt> and <dd> elements must be contained by a <dl>

document-title.description: Ensures each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element
document-title.help: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation

duplicate-id-active.description: Ensures every id attribute value of active elements is unique
duplicate-id-active.help: IDs of active elements must be unique

duplicate-id-aria.description: Ensures every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique
duplicate-id-aria.help: IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique

duplicate-id.description: Ensures every id attribute value is unique
duplicate-id.help: id attribute value must be unique

focus-order-semantics.description: Ensures elements in the focus order have an appropriate role
focus-order-semantics.help: Elements in the focus order need a role appropriate for interactive content

form-field-multiple-labels.description: Ensures form field does not have multiple label elements
form-field-multiple-labels.help: Form field must not have multiple label elements

frame-tested.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain the axe-core script
frame-tested.help: Frames must be tested with axe-core

frame-title-unique.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a unique title attribute
frame-title-unique.help: Frames must have a unique title attribute

frame-title.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a non-empty title attribute

heading-order.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
heading-order.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

hidden-content.help: Hidden content on the page cannot be analyzed

html-has-lang.description: Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute
html-has-lang.help: <html> element must have a lang attribute

html-lang-valid.description: Ensures the lang attribute of the <html> element has a valid value
html-lang-valid.help: <html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute

html-xml-lang-mismatch.description: Ensure that HTML elements with both valid lang and xml:lang attributes agree on the base language of the page
html-xml-lang-mismatch.help: HTML elements with lang and xml:lang must have the same base language

image-alt.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation

image-redundant-alt.description: Ensure image alternative is not repeated as text
image-redundant-alt.help: Alternative text of images should not be repeated as text

input-button-name.description: Ensures input buttons have discernible text
input-button-name.help: Input buttons must have discernible text

input-image-alt.description: Ensures <input type="image"> elements have alternate text
input-image-alt.help: Image buttons must have alternate text

label-content-name-mismatch.description: Ensures that elements labelled through their content must have their visible text as part of their accessible name
label-content-name-mismatch.help: Elements must have their visible text as part of their accessible name

label-title-only.description: Ensures that every form element is not solely labeled using the title or aria-describedby attributes
label-title-only.help: Form elements should have a visible label

label.description: Ensures every form element has a label

landmark-banner-is-top-level.description: Ensures the banner landmark is at top level
landmark-banner-is-top-level.help: Banner landmark must not be contained in another landmark

landmark-complementary-is-top-level.description: Ensures the complementary landmark or aside is at top level
landmark-complementary-is-top-level.help: Aside must not be contained in another landmark

landmark-contentinfo-is-top-level.description: Ensures the contentinfo landmark is at top level
landmark-contentinfo-is-top-level.help: Contentinfo landmark must not be contained in another landmark

landmark-main-is-top-level.description: Ensures the main landmark is at top level
landmark-main-is-top-level.help: Main landmark must not be contained in another landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-banner.description: Ensures the document has at most one banner landmark
landmark-no-duplicate-banner.help: Document must not have more than one banner landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-contentinfo.description: Ensures the document has at most one contentinfo landmark
landmark-no-duplicate-contentinfo.help: Document must not have more than one contentinfo landmark

landmark-one-main.description: Ensures the document has only one main landmark and each iframe in the page has at most one main landmark
landmark-one-main.help: Document must have one main landmark

landmark-unique.description: Landmarks must have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

layout-table.description: Ensures presentational <table> elements do not use <th>, <caption> elements or the summary attribute
layout-table.help: Layout tables must not use data table elements

link-in-text-block.description: Links can be distinguished without relying on color
link-in-text-block.help: Links must be distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

list.description: Ensures that lists are structured correctly
list.help: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

listitem.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

marquee.help: <marquee> elements are deprecated and must not be used

meta-viewport-large.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> can scale a significant amount
meta-viewport-large.help: Users should be able to zoom and scale the text up to 500%

meta-viewport.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
meta-viewport.help: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled

p-as-heading.description: Ensure p elements are not used to style headings
p-as-heading.help: Bold, italic text and font-size are not used to style p elements as a heading

page-has-heading-one.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
page-has-heading-one.help: Page must contain a level-one heading

radiogroup.description: Ensures related <input type="radio"> elements have a group and that the group designation is consistent
radiogroup.help: Radio inputs with the same name attribute value must be part of a group

region.description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
region.help: All page content must be contained by landmarks

scope-attr-valid.description: Ensures the scope attribute is used correctly on tables
scope-attr-valid.help: scope attribute should be used correctly

scrollable-region-focusable.description: Elements that have scrollable content should be accessible by keyboard
scrollable-region-focusable.help: Ensure that scrollable region has keyboard access

server-side-image-map.description: Ensures that server-side image maps are not used
server-side-image-map.help: Server-side image maps must not be used

skip-link.description: Ensure all skip links have a focusable target
skip-link.help: The skip-link target should exist and be focusable

tabindex.description: Ensures tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
tabindex.help: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero

table-duplicate-name.description: Ensure that tables do not have the same summary and caption
table-duplicate-name.help: The <caption> element should not contain the same text as the summary attribute

table-fake-caption.description: Ensure that tables with a caption use the <caption> element.
table-fake-caption.help: Data or header cells should not be used to give caption to a data table.

td-has-header.description: Ensure that each non-empty data cell in a large table has one or more table headers
td-has-header.help: All non-empty td element in table larger than 3 by 3 must have an associated table header

td-headers-attr.description: Ensure that each cell in a table using the headers refers to another cell in that table
td-headers-attr.help: All cells in a table element that use the headers attribute must only refer to other cells of that same table

th-has-data-cells.description: Ensure that each table header in a data table refers to data cells
th-has-data-cells.help: All th elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader must have data cells they describe

valid-lang.description: Ensures lang attributes have valid values
valid-lang.help: lang attribute must have a valid value

video-description.help: <video> elements must have an audio description track

abstractrole.fail: Abstract roles cannot be directly used

aria-allowed-attr.pass: ARIA attributes are used correctly for the defined role
aria-allowed-attr.fail: ARIA attribute{{=it.data && it.data.length > 1 ? 's are' : ' is'}} not allowed:{{~it.data:value}} {{=value}}{{~}}

aria-allowed-role.pass: ARIA role is allowed for given element

aria-hidden-body.pass: No aria-hidden attribute is present on document body
aria-hidden-body.fail: aria-hidden=true should not be present on the document body

aria-errormessage.fail: aria-errormessage value{{=it.data && it.data.length > 1 ? 's' : ''}} {{~it.data:value}} `{{=value}}{{~}}` must use a technique to announce the message (e.g., aria-live, aria-describedby, role=alert, etc.)

has-widget-role.fail: Element does not have a widget role.

implicit-role-fallback.pass: Element’s implicit ARIA role is an appropriate fallback
implicit-role-fallback.fail: Element’s implicit ARIA role is not a good fallback for the (unsupported) role

invalidrole.fail: Role must be one of the valid ARIA roles

no-implicit-explicit-label.pass: There is no mismatch between a <label> and accessible name

valid-scrollable-semantics.pass: Element has valid semantics for an element in the focus order.
valid-scrollable-semantics.fail: Element has invalid semantics for an element in the focus order.

color-contrast.pass: Element has sufficient color contrast of {{=it.data.contrastRatio}}
color-contrast.fail: Element has insufficient color contrast of {{=it.data.contrastRatio}} (foreground color: {{=it.data.fgColor}}, background color: {{=it.data.bgColor}}, font size: {{=it.data.fontSize}}, font weight: {{=it.data.fontWeight}}). Expected contrast ratio of {{=it.data.expectedContrastRatio}}

incomplete.bgImage: Element's background color could not be determined due to a background image
incomplete.bgGradient: Element's background color could not be determined due to a background gradient
incomplete.imgNode: Element's background color could not be determined because element contains an image node
incomplete.bgOverlap: Element's background color could not be determined because it is overlapped by another element
incomplete.fgAlpha: Element's foreground color could not be determined because of alpha transparency
incomplete.elmPartiallyObscured: Element's background color could not be determined because it's partially obscured by another element
incomplete.elmPartiallyObscuring: Element's background color could not be determined because it partially overlaps other elements
incomplete.outsideViewport: Element's background color could not be determined because it's outside the viewport
incomplete.equalRatio: Element has a 1:1 contrast ratio with the background
incomplete.shortTextContent: Element content is too short to determine if it is actual text content

link-in-text-block.pass: Links can be distinguished from surrounding text in some way other than by color
link-in-text-block.fail: Links need to be distinguished from surrounding text in some way other than by color

incomplete.bgContrast: Element's contrast ratio could not be determined. Check for a distinct hover/focus style
incomplete.bgImage: Element's contrast ratio could not be determined due to a background image
incomplete.bgGradient: Element's contrast ratio could not be determined due to a background gradient
incomplete.imgNode: Element's contrast ratio could not be determined because element contains an image node
incomplete.bgOverlap: Element's contrast ratio could not be determined because of element overlap

autocomplete-appropriate.pass: the autocomplete value is on an appropriate element
autocomplete-appropriate.fail: the autocomplete value is inappropriate for this type of input

autocomplete-valid.pass: the autocomplete attribute is correctly formatted
autocomplete-valid.fail: the autocomplete attribute is incorrectly formatted

fieldset.pass: Element is contained in a fieldset

group-labelledby.pass: Elements with the name "{{=it.data.name}}" have both a shared label, and a unique label, referenced through aria-labelledby
group-labelledby.fail: {{var code = it.data && it.data.failureCode;}}Elements with the name "{{=it.data.name}}" do not all have {{? code === 'no-shared-label' }}a shared label{{?? code === 'no-unique-label' }}a unique label{{??}}both a shared label, and a unique label{{?}}, referenced through aria-labelledby

accesskeys.fail: Document has multiple elements with the same accesskey

focusable-disabled.pass: No focusable elements contained within element
focusable-disabled.fail: Focusable content should be disabled or be removed from the DOM

focusable-no-name.pass: Element is not in tab order or has accessible text
focusable-no-name.fail: Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text

focusable-not-tabbable.pass: No focusable elements contained within element
focusable-not-tabbable.fail: Focusable content should have tabindex='-1' or be removed from the DOM

landmark-is-top-level.pass: The {{=it.data.role }} landmark is at the top level.
landmark-is-top-level.fail: The {{=it.data.role }} landmark is contained in another landmark.

page-has-heading-one.pass: Page has at least one level-one heading
page-has-heading-one.fail: Page must have a level-one heading

page-has-main.pass: Document has at least one main landmark
page-has-main.fail: Document does not have a main landmark

page-no-duplicate-banner.pass: Document does not have more than one banner landmark
page-no-duplicate-banner.fail: Document has more than one banner landmark

page-no-duplicate-contentinfo.pass: Document does not have more than one contentinfo landmark
page-no-duplicate-contentinfo.fail: Document has more than one contentinfo landmark

page-no-duplicate-main.pass: Document does not have more than one main landmark
page-no-duplicate-main.fail: Document has more than one main landmark

tabindex.pass: Element does not have a tabindex greater than 0
tabindex.fail: Element has a tabindex greater than 0

alt-space-value.pass: Element has a valid alt attribute value
alt-space-value.fail: Element has an alt attribute containing only a space character, which is not ignored by all screen readers

duplicate-img-label.pass: Element does not duplicate existing text in alt text
duplicate-img-label.fail: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text

explicit-label.fail: Form element does not have an explicit <label>

help-same-as-label.pass: Help text (title or aria-describedby) does not duplicate label text
help-same-as-label.fail: Help text (title or aria-describedby) text is the same as the label text

hidden-explicit-label.pass: Form element has a visible explicit <label>
hidden-explicit-label.fail: Form element has explicit <label> that is hidden

implicit-label.fail: Form element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label>

label-content-name-mismatch.pass: Element contains visible text as part of it's accessible name
label-content-name-mismatch.fail: Text inside the element is not included in the accessible name

multiple-label.pass: Form field does not have multiple label elements
multiple-label.fail: Multiple label elements is not widely supported in assistive technologies

title-only.pass: Form element does not solely use title attribute for its label
title-only.fail: Only title used to generate label for form element

landmark-is-unique.pass: Landmarks must have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination
landmark-is-unique.fail: The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

has-lang.pass: The <html> element has a lang attribute
has-lang.fail: The <html> element does not have a lang attribute

valid-lang.pass: Value of lang attribute is included in the list of valid languages
valid-lang.fail: Value of lang attribute not included in the list of valid languages

xml-lang-mismatch.pass: Lang and xml:lang attributes have the same base language
xml-lang-mismatch.fail: Lang and xml:lang attributes do not have the same base language

dlitem.pass: Description list item has a <dl> parent element
dlitem.fail: Description list item does not have a <dl> parent element

listitem.pass: List item has a <ul>, <ol> or role="list" parent element
listitem.fail: List item does not have a <ul>, <ol> or role="list" parent element

only-dlitems.pass: List element only has direct children that are allowed inside <dt> or <dd> elements
only-dlitems.fail: List element has direct children that are not allowed inside <dt> or <dd> elements

only-listitems.pass: List element only has direct children that are allowed inside <li> elements
only-listitems.fail: List element has direct children that are not allowed inside <li> elements

structured-dlitems.pass: When not empty, element has both <dt> and <dd> elements
structured-dlitems.fail: When not empty, element does not have at least one <dt> element followed by at least one <dd> element

caption.pass: The multimedia element has a captions track
caption.incomplete: Check that captions is available for the element

description.pass: The multimedia element has an audio description track
description.incomplete: Check that audio description is available for the element

frame-tested.pass: The iframe was tested with axe-core
frame-tested.fail: The iframe could not be tested with axe-core
frame-tested.incomplete: The iframe still has to be tested with axe-core

css-orientation-lock.pass: Display is operable, and orientation lock does not exist
css-orientation-lock.fail: CSS Orientation lock is applied, and makes display inoperable
css-orientation-lock.incomplete: CSS Orientation lock cannot be determined

meta-viewport-large.pass: <meta> tag does not prevent significant zooming on mobile devices
meta-viewport-large.fail: <meta> tag limits zooming on mobile devices

meta-viewport.pass: <meta> tag does not disable zooming on mobile devices
meta-viewport.fail: {{=it.data}} on <meta> tag disables zooming on mobile devices

header-present.fail: Page does not have a header

landmark.fail: Page does not have a landmark region

meta-refresh.pass: <meta> tag does not immediately refresh the page
meta-refresh.fail: <meta> tag forces timed refresh of page

p-as-heading.pass: elements are not styled as headings
p-as-heading.fail: Heading elements should be used instead of styled p elements

region.pass: All page content is contained by landmarks
region.fail: Some page content is not contained by landmarks

skip-link.incomplete: Skip link target should become visible on activation

unique-frame-title.fail: Element's title attribute is not unique

duplicate-id-active.pass: Document has no active elements that share the same id attribute
duplicate-id-active.fail: Document has active elements with the same id attribute: {{=it.data}}

duplicate-id-aria.pass: Document has no elements referenced with ARIA or labels that share the same id attribute
duplicate-id-aria.fail: Document has multiple elements referenced with ARIA with the same id attribute: {{=it.data}}

duplicate-id.pass: Document has no static elements that share the same id attribute
duplicate-id.fail: Document has multiple static elements with the same id attribute

aria-label.pass: aria-label attribute exists and is not empty
aria-label.fail: aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty

aria-labelledby.pass: aria-labelledby attribute exists and references elements that are visible to screen readers
aria-labelledby.fail: aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty

avoid-inline-spacing.fail: Remove '!important' from inline style{{=it.data && it.data.length > 1 ? 's' : ''}} {{=it.data.join(', ')}}, as overriding this is not supported by most browsers

button-has-visible-text.pass: Element has inner text that is visible to screen readers
button-has-visible-text.fail: Element does not have inner text that is visible to screen readers

doc-has-title.fail: Document does not have a non-empty <title> element

has-alt.fail: Element does not have an alt attribute

has-visible-text.pass: Element has text that is visible to screen readers
has-visible-text.fail: Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers

non-empty-alt.pass: Element has a non-empty alt attribute
non-empty-alt.fail: Element has no alt attribute or the alt attribute is empty

non-empty-if-present.pass: Element {{?it.data}}has a non-empty value attribute{{??}}does not have a value attribute{{?}}
non-empty-if-present.fail: Element has a value attribute and the value attribute is empty

non-empty-title.fail: Element has no title attribute or the title attribute is empty

non-empty-value.pass: Element has a non-empty value attribute
non-empty-value.fail: Element has no value attribute or the value attribute is empty

role-none.pass: Element's default semantics were overriden with role="none"
role-none.fail: Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none"

role-presentation.pass: Element's default semantics were overriden with role="presentation"
role-presentation.fail: Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="presentation"

caption-faked.pass: The first row of a table is not used as a caption
caption-faked.fail: The first row of the table should be a caption instead of a table cell

has-caption.pass: Layout table does not use <caption> element

has-summary.pass: Layout table does not use summary attribute

has-th.pass: Layout table does not use <th> elements

html5-scope.pass: Scope attribute is only used on table header elements (<th>)
html5-scope.fail: In HTML 5, scope attributes may only be used on table header elements (<th>)

same-caption-summary.pass: Content of summary attribute and <caption> are not duplicated
same-caption-summary.fail: Content of summary attribute and <caption> element are identical

scope-value.fail: The value of the scope attribute may only be 'row' or 'col'

td-has-header.pass: All non-empty data cells have table headers
td-has-header.fail: Some non-empty data cells do not have table headers

td-headers-attr.pass: The headers attribute is exclusively used to refer to other cells in the table
td-headers-attr.fail: The headers attribute is not exclusively used to refer to other cells in the table

th-has-data-cells.pass: All table header cells refer to data cells
th-has-data-cells.fail: Not all table header cells refer to data cells
th-has-data-cells.incomplete: Table data cells are missing or empty

hidden-content.pass: All content on the page has been analyzed.
hidden-content.fail: There were problems analyzing the content on this page.
hidden-content.incomplete: There is hidden content on the page that was not analyzed. You will need to trigger the display of this content in order to analyze it.
